name: SilentBuyer.com
description: Shop, Earn, Play by your rules...
overview:
Changing eCommerce forever by allowing you to control the prices of your shopping basket…Shop, Earn, Play by your rules…

SilentBuyer is the world’s first intelligent social trading platform dedicated to the rapidly growing £32 billion flash sales and group-buying industry. Not only do members of the public control the Buy prices of the products and services they want; but they can also earn real money by Selling deals onto other members who missed out. All this happens in a fun, rewarding and dynamic gaming environment given our pioneering technology. As an industry first, we will guarantee to charge no fee if deals fail to make merchants more money and increase their brand value compared to existing group-buying and flash sales sites.

What do members do with the money they make? We already have a strategic partnership with Mastercard which has helped create our very own bank-grade payment gateway which allows us to make payments directly into members SilentBuyer Black Mastercards, ready to spend at 32 million locations and 1.6 million ATM machines worldwide. Being a member of SilentBuyer also generates up to £4000 a year on savings, cashback and exclusive member offers on hotels, restaurants, theatre, travel, entertainment and so much more.

Despite the high initial start-up costs originally required for the project, our experienced team have made huge progress entirely self-funding investment to this point, retaining 100% equity in the business and are about to kick-off presentations for VC funding. We believe we have built an unique and highly innovative algorithmic trading platform to get us this far and are readying ourselves for a Beta launch in August.

SilentBuyer is already tracking and analysing habits of well over 97,000,000 followers on various social networks as they talk about the brands they like and dislike. We already have a database of up to 70k+ potential users, 43 merchants representing 282 leading brands and our finger on the trigger to launch the biggest shake-up in eCommerce in a long time.
